game.name: EpiDexa Racing
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: EpiDexa Racing은 타임트라이얼과 온라인 멀티플레이어에 중점을 둔 아케이드 레이싱 게임입니다. 키보드나 컨트롤러로 플레이하며, 랭킹을 올라 세계 각국의 플레이어와 친구들에게 당신의 실력을 보여주세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: EpiDexa Racing is an arcade racing game focused on time trials and online multiplayer. Play with keyboard or controller, climb the leaderboards, and prove your skills against friends or players from around the world.
